description: Silverbeet replaces spinach in these cheesy filo pastry pies.
name: Silverbeet & Feta Filo Pies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a drizzle of the oil in a large pan on medium heat and cook the onion for 5 minutes. Stir in the garlic, silverbeet and kale and cook for 3 minutes, until wilted. Tip into a large bowl and leave to cool.
Pre-heat the oven to 200Â°C. Add the feta, dill, nutmeg and lemon to the greens and mix well.
Layer a muffin tin with 4 squares of filo pastry in each, brushing with oil in between. Fill each cup with feta mix. Repeat with the rest of the pastry and filling.
Bake for 20-25 minutes until crispy and golden.
